dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA--Notice of Copyright Infringement at http://img32.exs.cx/my.php?loc=img3
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 25, 2005 4:48 PM
To: ddermos@playboy.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA--Notice of Copyright Infringement at
http://img32.exs.cx/my.php?loc=img32&image=teripolo9hh.jpg.

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Dermos, Despina <ddermos@playboy.com>
To: <copyright@theplanet.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Monday, January 24, 2005, 1:12:13 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA--Notice of Copyright Infringement at
http://img32.exs.cx/my.php?loc=img32&image=teripolo9hh.jpg.

===8<==============Original message text===============


January 24, 2005



VIA EMAIL

The Planet.com Internet Services

1333 Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

copyright@theplanet.com

abuse@theplanet.com



Dear Sir or Madam:



It has been brought to our attention that web pages at

http://img32.exs.cx/my.php?loc=img32&image=teripolo9hh.jpg

display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy
Enterprises International, Inc. ("Playboy").  All right, title and
interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy.



I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on

http://img32.exs.cx/my.php?loc=img32&image=teripolo9hh.jpg

 are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.



Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy
copyrighted images on

http://img32.exs.cx/my.php?loc=img32&image=teripolo9hh.jpg

and on all web pages under your control.



Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at

http://img32.exs.cx/my.php?loc=img32&image=teripolo9hh.jpg.



I, Despina Dermos, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on
behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the
above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted
images.  My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises
International, Inc., 680 N. Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611,
Fax 312-266-2042, phone 312-751-8000, E-mail address is
ddermos@playboy.com.



This is a serious matter which needs to be resolved immediately.  We
expect that all Playboy copyright images will be removed within 48 hours
of your receipt of this email.



This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any
rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or
otherwise.  Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly
reserved.



Sincerely,



PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC.



Despina Dermos

Intellectual Property Enforcement Assistant



Cc:       Ana E. Cashman, Esq.








===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFB9sylvK/XpJs6oyURAqXHAJ9cPJAe+OTOrD2hgDBqfF+PUT8a5QCfVWWq
5aW4XnrooXexufdUcdVhrHg=
=0+lC
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
